TopicTitle: We need more command modules for rovers!

Articles.Content: The current command modules are awesome. But none of them have replaced the medium rover command module from ksp 1 and that one was absolutely awesome and very versatile. The new large rover module is great but we're missing a command module for the medium size and a small one for one kerbal would be nice too.

my main problem with the new one is that it just fits one type of rover and there are no other parts thaf fit well with it.  i would love a more round one and one more just generic like the one in ksp 1
I've tried to make rovers many times but I always end up with a grumble seat on a metal plate as a base...
I hope they will add stock options for rovers. Every rover looks like rockets or stations with wheels.
